The **black background** or **white background** line stays the same

Cloning Repo from GitHub to Local File System

```Git
git clone https://github.com/adarsh27april/Git-Hub.git
```

## Cloning a Repo

![1b055a435536c3650cec35764256a7b0.png](../_resources/1b055a435536c3650cec35764256a7b0.png)

Viewing Files in the Repo Folder

- Note that .git is a hidden file, it denotes that it is a Git folder

## Why we use SSH?

![b0be18fe8155b1497244d7265cb6ff82.png](../_resources/b0be18fe8155b1497244d7265cb6ff82.png)

![80e67ea7a22bcb70650fb653f3bb8f56.png](../_resources/80e67ea7a22bcb70650fb653f3bb8f56.png)

![d12df74e97c5099e5018fc285c5fbad1.png](../_resources/d12df74e97c5099e5018fc285c5fbad1.png)

![1b5a9d56ac4a7c2d3dddbbe21625d0d4.png](../_resources/1b5a9d56ac4a7c2d3dddbbe21625d0d4.png)

> **!!!Do Not Change it!!!**

```
ssh-rsa  adarshkumar27april@gmail.com
```

> **!!!Do Not Change it!!!**

[Generating a new SSH key and adding it to the ssh-agent](https://docs.github.com/en/github/authenticating-to-github/generating-a-new-ssh-key-and-adding-it-to-the-ssh-agent)

[Connecting to GitHub with SSH](https://docs.github.com/en/github/authenticating-to-github/connecting-to-github-with-ssh)
